# OIAN

| Muscle  | Origin | Insertion | Nerve | Action |
|------|--------|-------|----------|--------|
| [Sternocleidomastoid]({{< var ref-sternocleidomastoid.path >}}) | {{< var ref-sternocleidomastoid.origin >}} | {{< var ref-sternocleidomastoid.insertion >}} | {{< var ref-sternocleidomastoid.nerve >}} | {{< var ref-sternocleidomastoid.action >}} |

: Sternocleidomastoid OIAN {.striped .hover}


## Origin {#origin}

- Sternal head: [sternum (manubrium)]({{< var ref-sternum-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- Clavicular head: [Clavicle (medial 1/3)]({{< var ref-clavicle-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020


## Insertion {#insertion} 

- [Temporal bone (mastoid process)]({{< var ref-temporal-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- [Occipital bone (superior nuchal line)]({{< var ref-occipital-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation {#innervation}
[**Motor**: CN XI Accessory n.]({{< var ref-cn11.path >}}) and **Proprioception**: Cervical plexus (C2, C3, C4) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action {#action}

- **Unilateral**: [Tilts head to same side]({{< var ref-neck-msk.path >}}), [C/L head rotation]({{< var ref-neck-msk.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- **Bilateral**: Extends head, aids in [respiration]({{< var ref-respiration.path >}}) when head is fixed @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Muscle groups
The sternocleidomastoid is part of the [Superficial neck muscle group]({{< var ref-oians.path >}})
